member.name: T:DatabaseDeploy.Console.Options
member.summary: Contains the command line options for the application

member.name: P:DatabaseDeploy.Console.Options.ChangeLog
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the change log table.

member.name: P:DatabaseDeploy.Console.Options.ConnectionString
member.summary: Gets or sets a connection string to be used by the system

member.name: P:DatabaseDeploy.Console.Options.DatabaseManagementSystem
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating the type of DBMS to use.

member.name: P:DatabaseDeploy.Console.Options.DatabaseScriptPath
member.summary: Gets or sets the database script path

member.name: P:DatabaseDeploy.Console.Options.FileNamePattern
member.summary: Gets or sets the search pattern to use for file parsing

member.name: P:DatabaseDeploy.Console.Options.LastChangeToApply
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating the last change that should be applied to the database.
member.remarks: Set to 0 or max value (the default) to apply all changes. Any other positive number will stop applying changes at that level.

member.name: P:DatabaseDeploy.Console.Options.OutputFile
member.summary: Gets or sets the directory and file name that will be used for writing out the change script

member.name: P:DatabaseDeploy.Console.Options.Recursive
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether or not the script search should be recursive

member.name: P:DatabaseDeploy.Console.Options.RootDirectory
member.summary: Gets or sets the root directory for processing

member.name: P:DatabaseDeploy.Console.Options.Schema
member.summary: Gets or sets the schema to use as a prefix for the change log table.

member.name: P:DatabaseDeploy.Console.Options.ScriptListFile
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the file where the list of found scripts should be written.

member.name: P:DatabaseDeploy.Console.Options.SearchPattern
member.summary: Gets or sets the search pattern to use for file parsing

member.name: P:DatabaseDeploy.Console.Options.UndoOutputFile
member.summary: Gets or sets the directory and file name that will be used for writing out the undo change script

member.name: T:DatabaseDeploy.Console.Program
member.summary: The program.

member.name: F:DatabaseDeploy.Console.Program.Log
member.summary: Creates the default logger

member.name: P:DatabaseDeploy.Console.Program.ConfigurationService
member.summary: Gets or sets the deployment service to use. This is injected by unity and should not be set.

member.name: P:DatabaseDeploy.Console.Program.DeploymentService
member.summary: Gets or sets the deployment service to use. This is injected by unity and should not be set.

member.name: M:DatabaseDeploy.Console.Program.GetSetting``1(System.String)
member.summary: Gets a setting from app settings.
member.typeparam: The type of setting we're retrieving
member.returns: A setting for the requested value or the default setting.

member.name: M:DatabaseDeploy.Console.Program.Main(System.String[])
member.summary: The main entry point into the application.

member.name: M:DatabaseDeploy.Console.Program.ParseCommandLine(System.String[])
member.summary: Parses the command line parameters
member.param: The arguments passed on the command line.
